headline: Assessing Visa (V) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Visa stock slips after recent pullback Visa (V) shares have eased off their highs over the past month, slipping roughly 2% over the past 3 months even as the broader market has held up reasonably well. See our latest analysis for Visa. That pullback comes after a solid run, with Visa still sitting on a mid single digit year to date share price return and a three year total shareholder return above 60 percent. This suggests momentum has cooled, but the long term growth story remains intact. If...

headline: UbiRider Achieves PCI DSS Certification, Strengthening Security and Paving the Way for AI-Driven Transit Innovation
summary: PORTO, Portugal, December 03, 2025--UbiRider, the innovator behind the UbiRider Platform, the solution that seamlessly integrates transportation management, fare collection, open payments, passenger information, and data analytics into a single digital system, today announced that it has achieved Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) certification. This milestone validates UbiRider’s rigorous approach to payment security for bank cards and mobile wallets — collectively known as

headline: BGL: Initiation of Vertically Integrated Gold Fintech Company with a Price Target of $20.00.

headline: Institutional Activity Climbs This Bitcoin Cycle, Tokenized RWAs Reach $24B: Glassnode
summary: Bitcoin’s latest market cycle is shaping up to be one of its most mature, with new Glassnode data showing a surge in institutional participation, calmer trading conditions and rapid growth in tokenized real-world assets. Glassnode and Fasanara Capital, in their Q4 Digital Assets Report, say the structure of the market ...
